name: Hello Flamingo e-Pattern
description:
Create a flamboyance of sock Flamingos with the very latest pattern from Craft Schmaft. 

The flamingo e-pattern is a digital file, available for instant download once your payment is complete.  It includes step-by-step instructions, photographs, diagrams, pattern pieces and full material list.  

Easy to make, the flamingo pattern is designed for all levels of crafting skill from beginners to uber experts. 

You will need:
--------------------------------
1 pinky sock (adult size 2-8) 
1 contrast sock (adult size 2-8)  

Black felt (10 x 20cm/ 4 x 8")
Wing base felt  (20 x 30cm/ 8 x 12")
Wing and beak felt (20 x 30cm/ 8 x 12")
Wing highlight felt (10 x 20cm / 4 x 8")

Embroidery floss, (1 skein)
150-200g/7 ounces toy stuffing 
--------------------------------

Here's what other's have said about the Flamingo pattern: 

"I love transforming a plain sock into something so pretty. It looks really difficult and complicated, but is very easy to do!"

"Keep the lovely patterns coming, they are fantastic!"

name: Air Balloon Mobile e-Pattern
Owl Mobile e-Pattern
description:
Make your own beautiful Sock Owl Mobile with this pattern.

The mobile pattern comes as a PDF (digital file) format and includes complete instructions, diagrams and material list. 

Craft Schmaft patterns are very easy to follow for experienced crafters and beginners alike. The owls can be hand or machine stitched and the  finished items are soft, cuddly and baby friendly (no small parts or choking hazards).

Following payment you'll receive an email with link to download the PDF file so you can get crafting straight away.

Please note that this item is for an A4 sized PDF pattern in Metric Measurements. If you'd prefer Imperial measurements and Letter size pattern (suitable for North America), please go to the link below:

http://craftschmaft.bigcartel.com/product/owl-mobile-pattern-us-imperial-pdf


-----------------------------
As Featured in Frankie Magazine:
"There’s plenty of crafty inspiration to be had over at Craft Schmaft. Blogger Claire has a thing for making toys out of socks – just have a look at how cute this owl mobile is! "
-----------------------------

MATERIAL LIST:
Four socks {recommended baby size 6-18mths}
Felt for wings and eyes {approx 30 x 25cm}
Fabric for wings{approx  25 x 20cm}
One skein embroidery thread {perle 5} 
Needle and cotton/poly thread
Two 30cm twigs
Toy stuffing

name: Baby Zilla e-Pattern
Hot Air Balloon Kit - Carnivale
description:
Create a beautiful Hot Air Balloon mobile, inspired by a summer carnival, complete with little clouds using this luxe DIY kit. 

The kit includes: 
-------------------------------------
Fabric panel for 4 balloons and matching bunting
Pure wool felt for clouds and baskets
Matching DMC embroidery perle 
Fusible webbing
Satin ribbon trim
Pom Pom trim
Oak dowel for hanging the mobile
Pattern pieces and full instructions
-------------------------------------
The only thing you'll need are some toy stuffing (readily available in craft supply stores), scissors, needle and thread. 

Easy to follow, step-by-step instructions and full size pattern pieces are included. The fabric panel, inspired by vintage circus posters, is pre-printed with the pattern for each balloon top leaving you simply to cut out and sew. 

Each balloon measures around 20cm (8in) high by 12cm (4.5in) wide. The entire finished mobile dimensions are approximately 65cm (25in) high by 40cm wide (15in). You can of course adjust to your desired height.

description:

-------------------------------------
Fabric panel for 4 balloons and bunting
Pure wool felt for clouds and baskets
Matching DMC Perle 5 cotton thread
Fusible webbing
Ric-Rac and satin ribbon trim
Oak dowel 
Pattern
-------------------------------------

Easy to follow, step-by-step instructions and full size pattern pieces are included. The fabric panel, inspired by sunny seaside days, even has the pattern shape printed leaving you simply to cut out and sew.  

The only thing you need to supply is some toy stuffing (readily available in craft supply stores), scissors, a needle and thread.

name: Woof Woof e-Pattern
description:
The Woof Woof puppy dog pattern comes as a PDF (digital) file and includes step-by-step instructions, diagrams and material list for making a gorgeous sock dog.

Patterns are very easy to follow for experienced crafters and beginners alike. Sock toys can be hand or machine stitched. The finished items are soft, cuddly and baby friendly (no small parts or choking hazards).

----------------------------
Material list: One pair of socks (womens or mens size), toy stuffing, 20cm fabric, felt, embroidery thread (DMC perle 5)
----------------------------

No extra postage costs or waiting time. Following purchase you'll receive an email with a link to download the pattern so you can get crafting straight away!

name: Tummy Bunny e-Pattern
description:
Make your very own sock bunny sporting the squishiest tummy with this plush sewing pattern. 

The Funny Tummy Bunny pattern comes in PDF (digital file) format and includes complete instructions, diagrams and material list for making a sock rabbit. A complete stitch glossary and three options for bunny faces are also inside. 

Instructions are very easy to follow and suitable for beginners right through to experienced crafters. Measurements are in both Metric and Imperial.  Bunnies can be hand or machine stitched and the finished items are soft, cuddly and baby friendly (no small parts or choking hazards).

All you need are a pair of socks, some scraps of fabric and felt, a bit of thread and you're away!

Material List: 

---------------------------------- 
Two adult size, crew length socks 
Fabric for ears (20 x 30cm)
Embroidery thread (perle 5) 
Matching cotton thread
Toy stuffing (polyfibre or eco)
Optional: Black and white felt or 
buttons for eyes, pink felt for nose

---------------------------------- 


No postage costs or waiting time. Following purchase you'll receive an email with a link to download the pattern so you can get crafting straight away!

name: Hot Air Balloon Kit - Pink Sugar
description:
Create a sweet pink and aqua Hot Air Balloon complete with little floaty cloud with this DIY kit.

Inside the button and string envelope you'll find... 
------------------------------------- 
Fabric panel for a single balloon 
Pure wool felt for cloud and basket 
Matching DMC Perle 5 cotton thread 
Pink Ric Rac trim
Pattern
-------------------------------------

The fabric panel included in this kit features the pattern shape printed directly onto the material - simply to cut out and sew the balloon top. Easy to follow, step-by-step instructions and full size pattern pieces are also included so once you've made this balloon you can make many, many more. 

All you need to add is some toy stuffing (readily available in craft supply stores), scissors, a needle and thread.

Happy Crafting!

name: Fabric Panel - Hot Air Balloon Mobile in Carnivale
description:
Make four stunning balloons with matching bunting trim using this fabric panel. Beautifully detailed each panel is printed on quality quilting weight cotton. The designs are ready to be cut and assembled as individual balloons or a whimsical mobile. 

You will also need the Air Balloon pattern for assembly instructions, , stuffing, embroidery perle and felt to create little baskets and clouds. 

Panels are each 1/3 yard (44" wide). 

Air balloon pattern (instructions) available here: http://craftschmaft.bigcartel.com/product/air-balloon-mobile-pattern


-----------------------------
Free Domestic shipping, Flat rate $5 international shipping.

name: Baby Owl Kit (Washi)
description:
Make a little sock owl with this cute kit. A great gift or project for kids from 8 to 108. 

Contents include: Pattern, cotton sock,  washi tape fabric, wool blend felt and matching perle embroidery thread.

All you need is some stuffing, scissors and needle and thread. 

The step-by-step pattern is very easy to follow for beginners and experienced crafters alike and covers instructions/pattern pieces for any size sock... use it to make a whole family of owls if you like. 

Sock toys can be hand or machine stitched. The finished items are soft, cuddly and baby friendly (no small parts or choking hazards).


The finished owl measures approx: 12 - 15cm in height

name: Owl e-Pattern
description:
The Toot Owl pattern comes in PDF (digital file) format and includes complete instructions, diagrams and material list for making a sock owl.

Instructions are very easy to follow for experienced crafters and beginners alike. The pattern covers all size socks so you can make a mummy, daddy, baby owl or all three. Owls can be hand or machine stitched and the finished items are soft, cuddly and baby friendly (no small parts or choking hazards).

Measurements are available in both imperial/US Letter and Metric/A4. 

----------------------------------
Material List: 

One sock (any size)
Fabric (10cm/2" square)
Felt (10cm/2" square)
Embroidery thread (DMC Perle 5)
Toy stuffing
Matching cotton thread
----------------------------------

No extra postage costs or waiting time. Following purchase you'll receive an email with a link to download the pattern so you can get crafting straight away!

name: Sausage Roller e-Pattern
description:
Make your very own pull along Daschund Dog with this sock softie pattern. Pull along toys are a big hit with toddlers, especially the 1-2 year olds. 

This pattern comes as a PDF (digital file) format and includes complete instructions, diagrams and material list. Easy to follow for beginners and experienced crafters alike. No printing necessary. The finished items are soft, cuddly and child friendly - no small parts or choking hazards.

There are also instructions for creating legs, rather than wheels, for the dog if you prefer. 

------------------------
Material List
Two socks {crew length, adult size}
Embroidery thread {perle 5}
4 Wooden Wheels {50mm}
Dowel {8.5mm x 30cm}
Twill tape {2cm x 30cm}
Fabric {30 x 30cm}
Wood glue
Felt for eyes
Toy stuffing
Optional: Cat or Puppy Collar and lead
------------------------

No extra postage costs or waiting time. Following purchase you'll receive an email with a link to download the pattern so you can get crafting straight away!

Wheels are readily available to buy from toy hobby suppliers online globally:
USA/Canada (Bear Woods): http://bit.ly/aPn6LF
Australia (Timbecon): http://bit.ly/c4XeBp 
UK (Woodworks): http://bit.ly/9IIGrL

name: Lil' Monster Pattern e-Pattern
description:
This Little Monster is made from just one odd sock (adult size), some felt and embroidery thread. He's very easy to make and is a big hit with kids.

The pattern includes complete instructions, diagrams and material list. It comes in PDF (digital) format which is available for download immediately following payment. 

The pattern is very easy to follow for beginners and experienced crafters alike. Sock toys can be hand or machine stitched. The finished items are soft, cuddly and baby friendly (no small parts or choking hazards).

You will need: One sock, some stuffing, felt and embroidery thread (Perle 5 or stranded)

name: G-Raf e-Pattern
description:

Patterns are very easy to follow for beginners and experienced crafters alike. Sock toys can be hand or machine stitched. The finished items are soft, cuddly and baby friendly (no small parts or choking hazards).

-----------------------------
Materials you will need:
One pair of socks, stuffing, felt, 50cm grosgrain ribbon, needle & thread and embroidery thread.
-----------------------------

No extra postage costs or waiting time. Following purchase you'll receive an email with a link to download the pattern so you can get crafting straight away!

name: Rudolph Reindeer e-Pattern
description:
Make your very own Rudolph the pull-along sock reindeer with this PDF pattern.

The pattern is very easy to follow and includes step-by-step instructions, diagrams and material list to create Rudolph and attach his wooden wheels. 


Material List: 
--------------------------------------
   • One pair of socks (adult size, crew length)
   • Embroidery thread in red, black and white (perle cotton or floss) 
   • Felt for antlers (20 x 30cm/ 8 x 12")
   • Red and white felt scraps for ears
   • 4 wooden wheels (50mm/2" diameter, 3/8" hole)
   • Dowel (9mm x 300mm, 3/8"x 12")
   • Cotton or Polyester tape (2cm x 32cm, 1" x 13")
   • Toy Stuffing 
   • Wood Glue
   • Ribbon for lead (30cm, 12")
-----------------------------------

The Rudolph pattern comes in PDF (digital) format that you'll be able to download directly after purchase - choose from A4/metric or US Letter/imperial measurements. The pattern pieces can be printed at home on a single sheet of paper with no scaling, sticky taping or tracing required. Sock toys can be hand or machine stitched. 

Note: For child safety lead should be no longer than 22cm/9" long.


Wheels are readily available to buy from toy hobby suppliers online globally: 
USA/Canada (Bear Woods): http://bit.ly/aPn6LF 
Australia (Timbecon): http://bit.ly/c4XeBp 
UK (Woodworks): http://bit.ly/9IIGrL

name: Rudolf pull-along Reindeer Kit
description:
Make your very own Rudolf the sock reindeer to pull-along with this  deluxe plush kit. 

All of the materials are in the box, including the wooden wheel and dowel, all you have to add is some stuffing and you're away. The pattern is very easy to follow for beginners and experienced crafters alike with step-by-step instructions and clear diagrams. Sock toys can be hand or machine stitched and are a great gift. 

Contents Include: 
   * Adult size socks
   * Felt (brown, white, black)
   * Embroidery thread
   * Cotton tape
   * 4 Wooden wheels
   * Dowel axels
   * Pattern pieces/Instructions


FREE SHIPPING AUSTRALIA WIDE
Order by 16th December for pre-Christmas delivery.

name: Sausage Roller Kit - Navy
description:
Make your very own pull-along Daschund puppy with this craft kit. 

The kit contains: 

     * pattern and instructions
     * navy argyle socks
     * geometric or red herringbone fabric
     * wool blend felt
     * embroidery perle
     * wood dowel and wheels

The only thing you need to add is some stuffing and glue and you're away! 

This pattern takes you through, step-by-step, sewing and assembling the Sausage dog. Easy to follow for beginners and experienced crafters alike. 

The Sausage Roller is a big hit with toddlers, add some ribbon for a collar and lead and they'll love taking the dog for walk. 

(Safety note - lead should be no longer than 22cms for children under 3).


-----------------------------
Just $7 shipping in Australia, Flat rate $12 international shipping.

The step-by-step pattern is very easy to follow for beginners and experienced crafters alike and covers instructions/pattern pieces for any size sock... use it to make a whole family of owls if you like. 

Sock toys can be hand or machine stitched. The finished items are soft, cuddly and baby friendly (no small parts or choking hazards).


The finished owl measures approx: 12 - 15cm in height

name: Baby Zilla Kit - Candy
description:
Create your very own Baby Sock Zilla with this DIY kit.  Just one sock, some stuffing and felt and he's ready to demolish everything in sight!


The kit includes:
------------------------------
Pattern pieces and full instructions
One adult size argyle sock
Navy blue felt
White felt
Black felt
------------------------------

All you need are a pair scissors, needle and thread and some stuffing and you're away. The pattern includes complete instructions, pattern pieces, diagrams and material list so after your first Zilla you can make a whole tribe of them ready to raaaawwwrr!

This project is very easy to follow for beginners and experienced crafters alike. Sock toys can be hand or machine stitched. The finished items are soft, cuddly and baby friendly (no small parts or choking hazards).



FREE SHIPPING AUSTRALIA WIDE
Order by 16th December for pre-Christmas delivery.
